Description:
Run agile project management processes.
Conduct code reviews and make technical contributions to product architecture as well as getting involved in solving bugs and delivering small features.
Have strong experience in software engineering and architectural patterns. Technologies: Cross platforms, Azure cloud, JavaScript, Java, Docker, REST/JSON, RDBMS, AWS, Open Source, etc. 
Work on large-scale, high-volume web and mobile applications.  
Have a deep understanding of software quality and what it takes to construct resilient and impactful solutions. 
Foster technical decision making on the team but make final decisions when necessary.
Support in creating project plans for epics along with the product managers.
Mentor and develop engineers along their personal development path.
Research and develop technical specifications for digital products.
Manage a team of engineers across various digital disciplines and build cross functional teams.
Ensure products have the right support and monitoring in place.
Provide clear and concise instructions to engineering teams.
Collaborating with the front-end and back-end developers and other team members to establish objectives and design more functional, cohesive codes to enhance the user experience.
Coordinate work with other managers and staffJob Details
